body.Subject: Teams Call Queue Amendment Request - @{triggerBody()?['RequestID']}
body.Body:
Hi,

Your request, @{triggerBody()?['RequestID']} , to amend Call Queue @{triggerBody()?['CQName']} has been completed.

Thanks,

The Voice and Video Team

body.Subject: Teams Call Queue Request Failure
body.Body:
This email is to notify that a request to amend a Teams Call Queue has failed to complete.

Please log onto Azure to check for errors in the Runbook.

Job ID: @{body('Amend_Call_Queue_-_Welcome')?['properties']?['jobId']}
Request ID: @{body('Amend_Call_Queue_-_Welcome')?['id']}
Start Time: @{body('Amend_Call_Queue_-_Welcome')?['properties']?['startTime']}
